title: From Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: Ronaldo
text:
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment
'RONALDO' SETS GROUNDBREAKING GLOBAL RELEASE
UNIQUE FILM EVENT TO REACH CRISTIANO'S ARMY OF FANS ACROSS 75 COUNTRIES IN CINEMAS ON MONDAY, NOVEMBER 9th
DOCUMENTARY ADDS DVD & DIGITAL HD DISTRIBUTION TO THEATRICAL GLOBAL RELEASE, AVAILABLE ON TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 10th IN THE UNITED STATES AND CANADA
UNIVERSAL CITY, Calif. , Oct. 12, Cristiano Ronaldo's fans around the world will now be able to own a copy of RONALDO , the powerful new documentary from the makers of Senna and Amy , within one day of its release in cinemas.
In a ground-breaking film event befitting the footballing star's level of global stardom, RONALDO will be available to own across 75 countries.
As previously announced, Cristiano will be marking this unique global film event by attending a special premiere event in London the previous night, to be simulcast to over 300 cinemas around the world.
Cristiano said: " RONALDO is the only official film about me that will show– for the very first time – what my life is really like. My amazing fans are why I made the film so I'm excited to share it with them all at the same time with the global release."
Anticipation for the triple Ballon d'Or winner's first film is reaching fever pitch with the first trailer, released just two weeks ago, garnering over 14 million views to date.
To give fans another taste of what to expect, a deleted scene has been released today and is available to view here: www.facebook.com/ronaldofilm
This clip, which will be part of the exclusive DVD extras, gives a sneak peak at the intimate look into Cristiano's family life and his relationship with his son that the documentary will offer.
Filmed over 14 months with unprecedented access into the inner circle of the man and the sport, RONALDO is directed by Emmy ® Award winner Anthony Wonke and produced by Paul Martin for We Came We Saw We Conquered Studios. Executive producers are James Gay-Rees and Asif Kapadia for On the Corner Films, the multi-award winning production company behind Senna and Amy .
RONALDO will be available in the United States and Canada on DVD and Digital HD November 10th , perfect timing for Christmas gift shopping!
